New Records: Wales secured a Euro 2024 play-off final spot after their 4-1 victory over Finland
Key Match Events: Wales took an early lead with a goal by David Brooks after a one-two with Harry Wilson
Finland equalized before halftime with a goal by Teemu Pukki
Wales restored their lead with goals by Neco Williams and Brennan Johnson
Daniel James scored a late goal due to a defensive error
Pre-Game Insights: Wales set up a final date with Poland after their win
Rob Page's team showed they can compete with strong teams like Poland
Post-Match Reflections: Brennan Johnson was decisive with an early goal and an assist
David Brooks played a key role in Wales' win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wales' 4-1 win was a dominant performance
The match was followed by details about the upcoming final against Poland
